revision.text:
This is a list of the default [[Classes|classes]] available in Hexen and its expansion. For classes from other games, see the [[Classes|main article]].
==Characters==
===Minions=== {{Class|Bishop}} // Dark bishop {{Class|BishopBlur}} // Bishop strafing blur {{Class|BishopPainBlur}} // Bishop pain blur {{Class|BishopPuff}} // Bishop smoke (released when a bishop is killed)
{{Class|Centaur}} // Centaur {{Class|CentaurLeader}} // Slaughtaur {{Class|CentaurMash}} // Phantasmal centaur (usually spawned by Korax)
{{Class|CentaurFX}} // Projectile fired from the {{Class|CentaurLeader|slaughtaurs}}' {{Class|CentaurShield|shields}}.
{{Class|CentaurShield}} // Centaur shield {{Class|CentaurSword}} // Centaur sword
{{Class|Demon1}} // Green chaos serpent, spits red fire balls {{Class|Demon1Mash}} // Phantasmal green chaos serpent (usually spawned by Korax) {{Class|Demon2}} // Brown chaos serpent, spits green fire balls {{Class|Demon2Mash}} // Phantasmal brown chaos serpent (usually spawned by Korax)
{{Class|Demon1FX1}} // Green chaos serpent fireball {{Class|Demon2FX1}} // Brown chaos serpent fireball
{{Class|DemonChunk}} // Base class for chaos serpent meat chunks {{Class|Demon1Chunk1}} // Green chaos serpent right arm {{Class|Demon1Chunk2}} // Green chaos serpent left arm {{Class|Demon1Chunk3}} // Green chaos serpent small meat chunk {{Class|Demon1Chunk4}} // Green chaos serpent big meat chunk {{Class|Demon1Chunk5}} // Green chaos serpent bloody meat chunk {{Class|Demon2Chunk1}} // Brown chaos serpent right arm {{Class|Demon2Chunk2}} // Brown chaos serpent left arm {{Class|Demon2Chunk3}} // Brown chaos serpent small meat chunk {{Class|Demon2Chunk4}} // Brown chaos serpent big meat chunk {{Class|Demon2Chunk5}} // Brown chaos serpent bloody meat chunk
{{Class|Ettin}} // Ettin {{Class|EttinMash}} // Phantasmal ettin (usually spawned by Korax)
{{Class|EttinMace}} // Ettin mace
{{Class|FireDemon}} // Afrit {{Class|FireDemonMissile}} // Afrit shot {{Class|FireDemonRock1}} // Afrit ball piece 1 {{Class|FireDemonRock2}} // Afrit ball piece 2 {{Class|FireDemonRock3}} // Afrit ball piece 3 {{Class|FireDemonRock4}} // Afrit ball piece 4 {{Class|FireDemonRock5}} // Afrit ball piece 5 {{Class|FireDemonSplotch1}} // Afrit corpse piece 1 {{Class|FireDemonSplotch2}} // Afrit corpse piece 2
{{Class|IceGuy}} // Wendigo {{Class|IceGuyBit}} // Wendigo piece {{Class|IceGuyWisp1}} // Medium wendigo wisp {{Class|IceGuyWisp2}} // Small wendigo wisp
{{Class|Serpent}} // Stalker (waterlurker) {{Class|SerpentGib1}} // Stalker gib 1 {{Class|SerpentGib2}} // Stalker gib 2 {{Class|SerpentGib3}} // Stalker gib 3 {{Class|SerpentHead}} // Stalker's head (when gibbed) {{Class|SerpentLeader}} // Slime firing stalker
{{Class|Wraith}} // Reiver (Wraith) {{Class|WraithBuried}} // Buried reaver {{Class|WraithFX3}} // Reaver melee attack effect {{Class|WraithFX4}} // Dripping effect for reiver {{Class|WraithFX5}} // Dripping effect for reiver
===Bosses=== {{Class|Dragon}} // Death wyvern
{{Class|ClericBoss}} // Traductus (cleric boss) {{Class|FighterBoss}} // Zedek (fighter boss) {{Class|MageBoss}} // Menelkir (mage boss
{{Class|Heresiarch}} // Heresiarch {{Class|SorcBall}} // Base class for Heresiarch floating cubes {{Class|SorcBall1}} // Purple Heresiarch floating cube {{Class|SorcBall2}} // Blue Heresiarch floating cube {{Class|SorcBall3}} // Green Heresiarch floating cube {{Class|SorcFX1}} // Heresiarch Bouncing flaming head {{Class|SorcFX2}} // Heresiarch invulnerability effect {{Class|SorcFX2T1}} // Heresiarch invulnerability effect (translucent) {{Class|SorcFX3}} // Heresiarch bishop spawner {{Class|SorcFX3Explosion}} // Heresiarch bishop spawner explosion {{Class|SorcFX4}} // Heresiarch exploding ball {{Class|SorcSpark1}} // Heresiarch spellcasting spark
{{Class|Korax}} // Korax {{Class|KoraxBolt}} // Korax command bolt (rises to ceiling) {{Class|KoraxSpirit}} // Korax spirit (spawned when Korax is killed)
===Special=== {{Class|BatSpawner}} // Bat spawner (spawns bats when activated) {{Class|Bat}} // Bat {{Class|MinotaurFriend}} // Dark servant {{Class|MinotaurSmoke}} // Smoke for summoning the dark servant {{Class|MinotaurSmokeExit}} // Dark servant exit smoke {{Class|Pig}} // Pig
==Explosives== {{Class|Arrow}} // Arrow projectile (ACS) {{Class|AxePuff}} // Axe puff {{Class|AxePuffGlow}} // Charged axe puff (Electric) {{Class|BishopFX}} // Homing bishop shot {{Class|BlastEffect}} // Disc of repulsion effect {{Class|CentaurFX}} // Slaughtaur shot {{Class|CircleFlame}} // Firestorm circle flame {{Class|CFlameFloor}} // Firestorm trail {{Class|CFlameMissile}} // Firestorm shot {{Class|CStaffMissile}} // Serpent staff shot {{Class|CStaffPuff}} // Serpent staff melee puff {{Class|Dart}} // Dart projectile (ACS) {{Class|Demon1FX1}} // Green chaos serpent fireball {{Class|Demon2FX1}} // Brown chaos serpent fireball {{Class|DragonExplosion}} // Death wyvern fireball explosion {{Class|DragonFireball}} // Death wyvern fireball {{Class|FireBall}} // Fireball projectile (for use by ACS) {{Class|FireBomb}} // Flechette (hangs in air, explodes) {{Class|FlamePuff}} // Firestorm flame {{Class|FlamePuff2}} // Firestorm flame (lasts longer) {{Class|FrostMissile}} // Frost shard {{Class|FSwordFlame}} // Quietus flame {{Class|FSwordMissile}} // Quietus shot (spawns FSwordFlame on impact) {{Class|HammerMissile}} // Hammer shot {{Class|HammerPuff}} // Hammer puff {{Class|HolyMissile}} // Wraithverge shot (spawns 4 HolySpirit actors after traveling a short distance) {{Class|HolyMissilePuff}} // Wraithverge trail {{Class|HolyPuff}} // Spirit damage puff (spawned when spirit damages actor) {{Class|HolySpirit}} // Spirit {{Class|HolyTail}} // Spirit tail {{Class|HolyTailTrail}} // Spirit tail trail {{Class|IceFXPuff}} // Wendigo shot trail {{Class|IceGuyFX}} // Wendigo shot (spawns IceGuyFX2 on impact) {{Class|IceGuyFX2}} // Wendigo shot shard {{Class|IceShard}} // Ice Shard {{Class|LightningCeiling}} // Arc Of death shot (ceiling) {{Class|LightningFloor}} // Arc Of death shot (floor) {{Class|LightningZap}} // Arc Of death shot (center) {{Class|MageStaffFX2}} // Bloodscourge shot {{Class|MageWandMissile}} // Sapphire wand shot {{Class|MageWandSmoke}} // Sapphire wand trail {{Class|PoisonBag}} // Flechette (bursts into PoisonCloud) {{Class|PoisonCloud}} // Poison cloud (spawned by poison mushrooms or cleric fléchette) {{Class|PoisonDart}} // Poison dart projectile (ACS) {{Class|PorkFX}} // Porkulator Shot {{Class|ProjectileBlade}} // Blade projectile (ACS) {{Class|PunchPuff}} // Fighter's fist puff {{Class|RipperBall}} // Ripper projectile (ACS) {{Class|SerpentFX}} // Stalker's slime projectile {{Class|TelOtherFX1}} // Banishment device effect {{Class|TelOtherFX2}} // Banishment device effect {{Class|TelOtherFX3}} // Banishment device effect {{Class|TelOtherFX4}} // Banishment device effect {{Class|TelOtherFX5}} // Banishment device effect {{Class|ThrowingBomb}} // Flechette (bounces around and explodes) {{Class|WraithFX1}} // Reiver's projectile {{Class|WraithFX2}} // Sizzle for Reiver's projectile
==Pickups==
===Weapons=== {{Class|BloodscourgeDrop}} // Dropped bloodscourge pieces {{Class|QuietusDrop}} // Dropped quietus pieces {{Class|WraithvergeDrop}} // Dropped wraithverge pieces (Spawned by dying player) {{Class|CWeapFlame}} // Firestorm {{Class|CWeapMace}} // Mace (cannot be spawned) {{Class|CWeapStaff}} // Serpent staff {{Class|CWeapWraithverge}} // Wraithverge (cannot be spawned) {{Class|CWeaponPiece1}} // Wraithverge piece (top) {{Class|CWeaponPiece2}} // Wraithverge piece (center) {{Class|CWeaponPiece3}} // Wraithverge piece (bottom) {{Class|FWeapAxe}} // Timon's axe {{Class|FWeapFist}} // Fighter's fists (cannot be spawned) {{Class|FWeapHammer}} // Hammer of retribution {{Class|FWeapQuietus}} // Quietus (cannot be spawned) {{Class|FWeaponPiece1}} // Quietus piece (top) {{Class|FWeaponPiece2}} // Quietus piece (center) {{Class|FWeaponPiece3}} // Quietus piece (bottom) {{Class|MWeapBloodscourge}} // Bloodscourge (cannot be spawned) {{Class|MWeapFrost}} // Frost shards (weapon) {{Class|MWeapLightning}} // Arc of death {{Class|MWeapWand}} // Sapphire wand (cannot be spawned) {{Class|MWeaponPiece1}} // Bloodscourge piece (top) {{Class|MWeaponPiece2}} // Bloodscourge piece (center) {{Class|MWeaponPiece3}} // Bloodscourge piece (bottom) {{Class|Mana1}} // Blue mana {{Class|Mana2}} // Green mana {{Class|Mana3}} // Combined mana
===Health & Armor=== {{Class|CrystalVial}} // Crystal vial (heals up to 10 hp) {{Class|AmuletOfWarding}} // Amulet of warding {{Class|FalconShield}} // Falcon shield {{Class|MeshArmor}} // Mesh armor {{Class|PlatinumHelm}} // Platinum helm
===Inventory=== In Hexen, a player can carry up to 25 samples of any given inventory item. If a player already has 25 items of a given type, more items of the same type cannot be picked up until some are used. Some items are lost when entering a new hub.
{{Class|ArtiBlastRadius}} // Disc of repulsion {{Class|ArtiBoostArmor}} // Dragonskin bracers (+4 AC Hexen, +50 Armor any other game) {{Class|ArtiBoostMana}} // Krater of might {{Class|ArtiDarkServant}} // Dark servant artifact {{Class|ArtiFly}} // Wings of wrath (unlimited flight in the current hub) {{Class|ArtiHealingRadius}} // Mystic ambit incant (heals friends) {{Class|ArtiHealth}} // Quartz flask (heals up to 25 hp) {{Class|ArtiInvulnerability2}} // Icon of the defender (invulnerability item) {{Class|ArtiTorch}} // Torch (maximum brightness in all sectors, like Doom's infrared goggles) {{Class|ArtiPoisonBag}} // Fléchette pickup, gives variant 1, 2 or 3 depending on class {{Class|ArtiPoisonBag1}} // Poison gas fléchette, used by clerics. {{Class|ArtiPoisonBag2}} // Time bomb fléchette, used by mages. {{Class|ArtiPoisonBag3}} // Bouncing grenade fléchette, used by fighters. {{Class|ArtiPork}} // Porkalator {{Class|ArtiSpeedBoots}} // Boots of speed artifact {{Class|ArtiSuperHealth}} // Mystic urn (heals up to 99 hp) {{Class|ArtiTeleport}} // Chaos device (teleports back to level start) {{Class|ArtiTeleportOther}} // Banishment device artifact
{{Class|SummoningDoll}} // Summoning projectile for Dark Servant {{Class|Snout}} // Pig snout {{Class|SnoutPuff}} // Pig snout puff {{Class|PorkFX}} // Projectile that porcinizes people and monsters alike
===Quest=== {{Class|PuzzBook1}} // Daemon Codex (book) {{Class|PuzzBook2}} // Liber Oscura (book 2) {{Class|PuzzCWeapon}} // Holy Relic {{Class|PuzzFWeapon}} // Glaive Seal {{Class|PuzzFlameMask}} // Flame mask {{Class|PuzzGear1}} // Clock gear 1 {{Class|PuzzGear2}} // Clock gear 2 {{Class|PuzzGear3}} // Clock gear 3 {{Class|PuzzGear4}} // Clock Gear 4 {{Class|PuzzGemBig}} // Heart of D'Sparil {{Class|PuzzGemBlue1}} // Sapphire planet {{Class|PuzzGemBlue2}} // Sapphire planet 2 {{Class|PuzzGemGreen1}} // Emerald planet {{Class|PuzzGemGreen2}} // Emerald planet 2 {{Class|PuzzGemRed}} // Ruby planet {{Class|PuzzMWeapon}} // Sigil of the Magus {{Class|PuzzSkull}} // Yorick's skull
===Keys=== {{Class|KeyAxe}} // Axe key {{Class|KeyCastle}} // Castle key {{Class|KeyCave}} // Cave key {{Class|KeyDungeon}} // Dungeon key {{Class|KeyEmerald}} // Emerald key {{Class|KeyFire}} // Fire key {{Class|KeyHorn}} // Horn key {{Class|KeyRusted}} // Rusted key {{Class|KeySilver}} // Silver key {{Class|KeySteel}} // Steel key {{Class|KeySwamp}} // Swamp key
==Props== ===FX=== {{Class|FlameLarge}} // Large flame {{Class|FlameLargeTemp}} // Large flame (disappears) {{Class|FlameSmall}} // Small flame {{Class|FlameSmallTemp}} // Small flame (disappears) {{Class|DirtClump}} // Dirt clump (used by the thrust spike) {{Class|ThrustFloorDown}} // Thrust spike (starting state: down) {{Class|ThrustFloorUp}} // Thrust spike (starting state: up) {{Class|FogPatchLarge}} // Large fog Cloud {{Class|FogPatchMedium}} // Medium fog Cloud {{Class|FogPatchSmall}} // Small fog Cloud {{Class|FogSpawner}} // Fog spawner (spawns fog clouds when activated) {{Class|HWaterDrip}} // Water drip {{Class|Leaf1}} // Leaf {{Class|Leaf2}} // Leaf 2 {{Class|LeafSpawner}} // Leaf spawner {{Class|Bat}} // Bat {{Class|BatSpawner}} // Bat spawner {{Class|LittleFly}} // Fly
===Nature=== {{Class|TreeDestructible}} // Gray tree {{Class|ZLog}} // Tree log {{Class|ZMossCeiling1}} // Big moss {{Class|ZMossCeiling2}} // Small moss {{Class|ZPoisonShroom}} // Poison mushroom (releases {{Class|PoisonCloud|poison cloud}} upon death) {{Class|ZRock1}} // Rock {{Class|ZRock2}} // Rock 2 {{Class|ZRock3}} // Rock 3 {{Class|ZRock4}} // Rock 4 {{Class|ZRockBlack}} // Gray rock {{Class|ZRockBrown1}} // Large brown rock {{Class|ZRockBrown2}} // Medium brown rock {{Class|ZRubble1}} // Medium rubble {{Class|ZRubble2}} // Small rubble {{Class|ZRubble3}} // Small rubble 2 {{Class|ZShrub2}} // Large shrub {{Class|ZStalactiteIceLarge}} // Large ceiling icicle {{Class|ZStalactiteIceMedium}} // Medium ceiling icicle {{Class|ZStalactiteIceSmall}} // Small ceiling icicle {{Class|ZStalactiteIceTiny}} // Tiny ceiling icicle {{Class|ZStalactiteLarge}} // Large stalactite (ceiling) {{Class|ZStalactiteMedium}} // Medium stalactite (ceiling) {{Class|ZStalactiteSmall}} // Small stalactite (ceiling) {{Class|ZStalagmiteIceLarge}} // Large ground icicle {{Class|ZStalagmiteIceMedium}} // Medium ground icicle {{Class|ZStalagmiteIceSmall}} // Small ground icicle Stalagmite/stalagtite column {{Class|ZStalagmiteSmall}} // Small stalagmite (ground) {{Class|ZStumpBare}} // Broken tree stump {{Class|ZStumpBurned}} // Burned tree stump {{Class|ZStumpSwamp1}} // Shorter swamp tree stump {{Class|ZStumpSwamp2}} // Short swamp tree stump {{Class|ZSwampVine}} // Swamp vine {{Class|ZTree}} // Tree {{Class|ZTreeDead}} // Dead tree (smaller bounding box) {{Class|ZTreeGnarled1}} // Gnarled tree {{Class|ZTreeGnarled2}} // Gnarled tree 2 {{Class|ZTreeLarge1}} // Large tree {{Class|ZTreeLarge2}} // Large tree 2 {{Class|ZTreeSwamp120}} // Tall swamp tree {{Class|ZTreeSwamp150}} // Taller swamp tree {{Class|ZXmasTree}} // Christmas tree
===Dungeon=== {{Class|ZChainBit32}} // Short chain segment {{Class|ZChainBit64}} // Long chain segment {{Class|ZChainEndHeart}} // Hook with Meat {{Class|ZChainEndHook1}} // Large hook {{Class|ZChainEndHook2}} // Small hook {{Class|ZChainEndSkull}} // Hook with skull {{Class|ZChainEndSpike}} // Spike ball {{Class|ZIronMaiden}} // Iron maiden
===Palace=== {{Class|BrassTorch}} // Brass torch {{Class|ZArmorChunk}} // Armor piece {{Class|ZBannerTattered}} // Tattered banner {{Class|ZBarrel}} // Wooden barrel {{Class|ZBell}} // Bell (shootable, rings when hit) {{Class|ZBlueCandle}} // Blue candle {{Class|ZBucket}} // Hanging bucket {{Class|ZCandle}} // Candles {{Class|ZChandelier}} // Chandelier {{Class|ZChandelierUnlit}} // Chandelier (unlit) {{Class|ZFireBull}} // Fire bull {{Class|ZFireBullUnlit}} // Fire bull (unlit) {{Class|ZGemPedestal}} // Pedestal (uses heart of D'Sparil) {{Class|ZStatueGargoyleBlueShort}} // Gargoyle statue (Short, Ice) {{Class|ZStatueGargoyleBlueTall}} // Gargoyle statue (Tall, Ice) {{Class|ZStatueGargoyleDarkRedShort}} // Gargoyle statue (short, fire/stone) {{Class|ZStatueGargoyleDarkRedTall}} // Gargoyle statue (tall, fire/stone) {{Class|ZStatueGargoyleGreenShort}} // Gargoyle statue (short, stone) {{Class|ZStatueGargoyleGreenTall}} // Gargoyle statue (tall, stone) {{Class|ZStatueGargoyleRedShort}} // Gargoyle statue (short, fire) {{Class|ZStatueGargoyleRedTall}} // Gargoyle statue (tall, fire) {{Class|ZStatueGargoyleRustShort}} // Gargoyle statue (short, rusted metal) {{Class|ZStatueGargoyleRustTall}} // Gargoyle statue (tall, rusted metal) {{Class|ZStatueGargoyleStripeTall}} // Gargoyle statue (tall, wood/stone) {{Class|ZStatueGargoyleTanShort}} // Gargoyle statue (short, wood) {{Class|ZStatueGargoyleTanTall}} // Gargoyle statue (tall, wood) {{Class|ZSuitOfArmor}} // Suit of armor ([[Hexen Breakable Items|breakable, may contain items]]) {{Class|ZTwinedTorch}} // Twined Torch {{Class|ZTwinedTorchUnlit}} // Twined Torch (unlit) {{Class|ZVasePillar}} // Vase (on pedestal) {{Class|ZWallTorch}} // Wall torch {{Class|ZWallTorchUnlit}} // Wall torch (unlit) {{Class|ZWingedStatue}} // Winged statue {{Class|ZWingedStatueNoSkull}} // Winged statue missing skull (uses Yorick's skull)
===Kitchen=== {{Class|Pottery1}} // Tall pottery ([[Hexen Breakable Items|breakable, may contain items]]) {{Class|Pottery2}} // Medium pottery ([[Hexen Breakable Items|breakable, may contain items]]) {{Class|Pottery3}} // Short pottery ([[Hexen Breakable Items|breakable, may contain items]]) {{Class|PotteryBit}} // Shattered pottery piece {{Class|TableShit1}} // Large mug {{Class|TableShit2}} // Medium mug {{Class|TableShit3}} // Tall unlit candle with webbing {{Class|TableShit4}} // Medium unlit candle {{Class|TableShit5}} // Tall unlit candle {{Class|TableShit6}} // Spilled goblet {{Class|TableShit7}} // Goblet {{Class|TableShit8}} // Short goblet {{Class|TableShit9}} // Short goblet with silver ends {{Class|TableShit10}} // Meat cleaver {{Class|ZCauldron}} // Cauldron {{Class|ZCauldronUnlit}} // Cauldron (unlit)
===Death=== {{Class|BloodPool}} // Pool of blood {{Class|CorpseBit}} // Corpse piece {{Class|CorpseBloodDrip}} // Blood drop {{Class|ZCorpseHanging}} // Corpse (hanging from chain) {{Class|ZCorpseKabob}} // Corpse (impaled) {{Class|ZCorpseLynched}} // Corpse (hanging) {{Class|ZCorpseLynchedNoHeart}} // Corpse (hanging, bleeding/missing heart) {{Class|ZCorpseSitting}} // Corpse (sitting, breakable) {{Class|ZCorpseSleeping}} // Corpse (sleeping) {{Class|ZTombstoneBigCross}} // Tombstone (cross, blank, facing left) {{Class|ZTombstoneBrianP}} // Tombstone (small cross, BRIAN P, facing right) {{Class|ZTombstoneBrianR}} // Tombstone (cross+circle, BRIAN R, facing left) {{Class|ZTombstoneCrossCircle}} // Tombstone (cross+circle, Blank, facing right) {{Class|ZTombstoneRIP}} // Tombstone (cross, RIP, facing right) {{Class|ZTombstoneShane}} // Tombstone (cross, SHANE, facing right) {{Class|ZTombstoneSmallCross}} // Tombstone (small cross, blank, facing left)
